page.title: 02FEATURES - MARTON & N'THORPE
page.content: {Upsall Hall,}a beautiful 100 year old estate set in scenic surroundings, is now a centre for handicapped people. There are plans to develop the facilities for the use of the community as a leisure farm and picnic site. In Nunthorpe Village there is a working {blacksmith's forge.}With the decline in the use of horses for transport since the beginning of this century, blacksmiths have become quite rare. Present day blacksmiths cater almost exclusively for the leisure rider. Across the road is{Nunthorpe {Hall.}This lovely old building stands in beautiful grounds with an ornamental pond. The hall is presently used as a home for the elderly. Near to Nunthorpe Village is the substantial complex of{Poole Hospital. Nearby is the oldest of the four Churches}in the area.
